channel.title: U know site that offers to host your server? (please reply)
channel.description:
Hi,
Well I look for a site that offers service:- host my server but so that I can edit stuff still can look in te the files,... and I was wondering or any of U guys had an idee or experience whit a site that offers this service ( If possible a decend speed and stuff but also a decend price!)
Please let me know. (and yea I know that my title says loop inside but that needs to be look inside )

item.title: U know site that offers to host your server? (please reply)
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

Thx!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2009, 03:13:17 am[/size][hr]People I want to thank all that offered to host my server but I already got host (thx to Si Force :D)
I’m now looking for coders (both site and java).

Read full topic
